summary: RESULTS Here are the results of the polls! Thanks to everyone who voted and hope you’re satisfied with how it turned out!...
body:
RESULTS

Here are the results of the polls! Thanks to everyone who voted and hope you’re satisfied with how it turned out!

Characters: Mezo Shoji, Hitoshi Shinso, Shoto Todoroki - Izuku Midoriya (tie)

AU: Soulmate, Fantasy

Containment: Fluff, Jealously

They’re all going to be scenarios, expect at least one of the fics to come out soon. I’ve been really busy lately, but I’m always glad to come back here!

Thank you to those who participated in the votes!!

body:
I made a BHNA animatic!! The song is “lemon boy” by Cavetown.

I’ve tried to upload this twice already but tumblr is not showing it to anyone. Ha ha, great.

Let’s see if third time’s the charm.

Enjoy everyone!!

summary: Imagine Dabi who enjoys reading and fills his room with books Dabi who likes drawing and painting but hides it Dabi who is a...
body:
Imagine

Dabi who enjoys reading and fills his room with books

Dabi who likes drawing and painting but hides it

Dabi who is a good student and enjoys studying

Dabi who can speak French and English

Dabi who is artistic and creative despite his father’s disapproval

Dabi who likes studying science and literature

Dabi who likes to read books in English

Dabi who can play guitar and piano

Dabi whose room is cluttered with notes and sketches

Dabi whose bed is messy

summary:
Who needs one love when you can have two?  Bakugou x Ashido x Kirishima   -v- Story Thread Below The Cut -v-

 [[MORE]] "I'm...
caption:
Who needs one love when you can have two? 

Bakugou x Ashido x Kirishima 


-v- Story Thread Below The Cut -v-

“I’m going to ask Bakugou out.” Mina flipped through her magazine, laying belly down on her bed, feet in the air. Kiri gave her no reply, sputtering noiselessly at her outburst. When she raised a brow at him, he spun around onto his knees, hands slammed down on the bed.

“You can’t do that! You KNOW I’ve had a thing for him since USJ!” Kiri sounded offended as he glared at his close friend. “That totally breaks the girl code, don’t you think?” Mina just laughed and closed her magazine.

“Maybe, but you obviously aren’t growing a pair any time soon. So I’m just gunna ask because I like him too. I’ve been holding off to give you a chance, but no longer, my dear.” Kiri floundered, glaring at the sheets, his mind working hard.

“Let’s just both ask him out? Whoever he chooses gets to date him, the other is happy for them. And if he picks neither, then that’s fine too. Deal?” Kiri held out a hand, watching Mina’s face.

She could tell he was desperate, and if this was the push he needed, she’d help. And if she got to date her crush in the end, it was still worth it. So she shook Kiri’s hand.

–

“Bakugou! Please go out with me!” Baku was cornered by two of his idiot squad, startled as they bowed and spoke in tandem. He didn’t miss the slight glare shared between the friends. He ignored it. “What!? Why the fuck would I date either of you idiots!?”

Neither flinched at his harsh words, they were used to it. “Because! You don’t have to date either of us!” “But we both like you and are sick of waiting. So please, give us an answer?” Kiri started, and Mina finished.

Baku was taken back, looking at the two morons who sent him near puppy dog eyed looks. “I’m not going to choose between you two!” They both sighed, almost disappointed. “I should’ve have to choose, who says I can’t date you both?!”

The blonde stormed away before either could completely process what he’d said. “We can try a date Friday night, both of you, and I.” He threw over his shoulder.

“If that’s fine with you two. If not, I’m not picking between you.” Baku added the last bit almost as an afterthought before storming out. It took a second for Kiri and Mina to snap out of their surprise, but when they did, their happy screams could be heard through the dorms.

–

They weren’t late for that first date, and the first date turned to many many more afterwards. Baku won’t admit it ever, but he’s glad they made it easy for him. He had preferred dating neither over choosing between them. Dating both was near heaven for him.
caption_abstract:
Who needs one love when you can have two? 

Bakugou x Ashido x Kirishima 


-v- Story Thread Below The Cut -v-

She could tell he was desperate, and if this was the push he needed, she’d help. And if she got to date her crush in the end, it was still worth it. So she shook Kiri’s hand.

–

“Bakugou! Please go out with me!” Baku was cornered by two of his idiot squad, startled as they bowed and spoke in tandem. He didn’t miss the slight glare shared between the friends. He ignored it. “What!? Why the fuck would I date either of you idiots!?”

Neither flinched at his harsh words, they were used to it. “Because! You don’t have to date either of us!” “But we both like you and are sick of waiting. So please, give us an answer?” Kiri started, and Mina finished.

Baku was taken back, looking at the two morons who sent him near puppy dog eyed looks. “I’m not going to choose between you two!” They both sighed, almost disappointed. “I should’ve have to choose, who says I can’t date you both?!”

The blonde stormed away before either could completely process what he’d said. “We can try a date Friday night, both of you, and I.” He threw over his shoulder.

“If that’s fine with you two. If not, I’m not picking between you.” Baku added the last bit almost as an afterthought before storming out. It took a second for Kiri and Mina to snap out of their surprise, but when they did, their happy screams could be heard through the dorms.

–

They weren’t late for that first date, and the first date turned to many many more afterwards. Baku won’t admit it ever, but he’s glad they made it easy for him. He had preferred dating neither over choosing between them. Dating both was near heaven for him.

Who needs one love when you can have two? 

Bakugou x Ashido x Kirishima

summary: “Bite my tongue, bide my time Wearing a warning sign Wait 'til the world is mine” I was originally going to paint this but I...
caption:
“Bite my tongue, bide my time
Wearing a warning sign
Wait ‘til the world is mine”

I was originally going to paint this but I fucked up by making the sketch too thick to paint over, so I turned it into a messy piece of a young Overhaul.

[ That says Chisaki Kai in cyrillics ]

title: Update #20
body: So I’m working on a few prompts today, Idk when they’ll be in because one is lemon/spicy/whatever you wanna call it and one is pretty much changing the entire rules for the universe. But just so you guys know, I’m gonna keep rolling this ball of creativity until it dries out, if you have a request let me know. But I also do want to work on some original content so maybe something Fire Emblem or Dragon Age related will come up?
